page.title: 10CLUBS AT STOKE ON TERN
page.content: {VINTAGE MACHINERY CLUB One of the interesting happenings in our area is the Tern Valley Vintage Machinery Club.This came about because a local man had an interest in old machinery. He started collecting tractors in 1973 because he liked them and wanted to preserve a part of the past.His oldest tractor is one that is 52 years old.He started the Tern Valley Vintage Club in 1979. He has over 100 people in his club. You can join the club at any age. He takes his tractors to shows. He wins a lot of prizes. He wins cups,medals and trophies.The John Deer wins the most trophies.He has 17 tractors.His tractors come from the U.S.A.,the U.K. and Germany.The strongest tractor is the Case DC 430 H.P. He collects horse impliments, cars, lorries, motor cycles and engines aswell.
